name: Prototype RPG: Narcher!
description:
Narcher! Ninja + Archer!

This is just a prototype, but I plan to turn it into a full game this year.
Read about how I made the prototype on this blog-page: HERE

Controls:

Left Mouse: Charge Arrow, release to fire
Right Mouse: Throw Shuriken
S: Crouch
A & D: Move
Spacebar: Jump

Main mechanics:
  • Weapons
    • Bow & Arrow 
      • Main attack, powerful!
      • Charges to add more range
    • Shuriken
      •  Secondary Attack, less powerful, but more utility.
  • Movement
    • Crouch
      • Reduces hit-box for dodging enemy projectiles
    • Wall Jump 
      • Adds for more map exploration!
Planned Stuff:
  • Player
    • Up-grades for Main & Secondary Weapons
    • Ability to change Secondary attack weapon
  • Enemies
    • Movement
    • Shoot Projectiles
  • Game
  1. Menu to change weapon
    1. Bomb Projectile
  2. Leveling
  3. Ladder mechanic
  4. Carry mechanic
  5. Level Objective
  6. Level Selection Screen
